title: Kangaroo creek gang: ...`do the right thing'
creator_credit: David Kefford, Terry Watt and Kangaroo Creek Gang
brief_description: An animated video which encourages primary school children to “Do the right thing’ when disposing of rubbish. Encourages children to place rubbish in bins and to sort for recycling. This video is part of a kit which includes an audiotape with songs and advice to teachers.
creator_credit_for_label: David Kefford, Terry Watt and Kangaroo Creek Gang
